name: Trucker Parking Simulator Real Monster Truck Car Racing Driving Test
name_original: Trucker Parking Simulator Real Monster Truck Car Racing Driving Test
description:
Drive a fleet of the most challenging vehicles on the road… TRUCKS!!
From Delivery Vans, Freight Trucks, Dumper Trucks, Specialist Trucks including a unique Flat-bed Truck with 3 different Steering Modes and the ultra-difficult Road Train double-trailered truck. It’s time to “Live the Life of a Real Trucker”!
_____________________________
DRIVE & PARK EIGHT AWESOME TRUCKS
Start your Trucker Career in the short but fast Delivery Van. Progress through ever-trickier Trucks and Mission, all the way up to the ridiculously long Road Train truck! Do you have what it takes to master every mission?
_____________________________
REALISTIC TRUCKS AND HANDLING
Feel the weight of these trucks under your control. Drive precisely; keep an eye out for traffic, especially when turning out of junctions... and DON’T CRASH!
_____________________________
INDUSTRIAL BUSINESS PARK LOCATION
Explore the massive Industrial Complex – a place that’s as busy as it is beautiful… beauty in an “industrial” kind of way that is!
_____________________________
FREE TO PLAY
The Main Game Mode is 100% FREE to Play, all the way through, no strings attached! Extra Game Modes that alter the rules slightly to make the game easier are available through In-App Purchases. Each mode has separate GameCenter leaderboards to make for totally fair online competition!

_____________________________
GAME FEATURES
▶ TRUCKS! Drive & Park 8 Awesome Heavyweight Trucks
▶ PARKING! Delve into a massive Truck Driver career
▶ CHALLENGING! Complete progressively more difficult missions in the fastest times you can
▶ REALISTIC! Massive map and realistic driving physics
▶ 100% Free-2-Play Missions
▶ CONTROL! Choose between Buttons, Wheel and Tilt. Includes MFi Game Controller Support
▶ LOOK OUT! Multiple camera angles including a First Person Drivers Cab view
▶ OPTIMISED! Runs on anything from (or better than) the iPhone 4, iPad 2, iPad Mini & iPod Touch (4th Generation)

-------------------------------------------------
From the creators of “The Best Parking Games on the App Store” (a comment given by many of our happy players!). See our other games for many more exciting Parking Simulator games!
